boardgame.name: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Wrath of Ashardalon Board Game
boardgame.description: From Wizards of the Coast website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A cooperative game of adventure for 1-5 players set in the world of Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A heavy shadow falls across the land, cast by a dark spire that belches smoke and oozes fiery lava. A cave mouth leads to a maze of tunnels and chambers, and deep within this monster-infested labyrinth lurks the most terrifying creature of all: a red dragon!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Designed for 1-5 players, this boardgame features multiple scenarios, challenging quests, and cooperative game play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player selects a hero; a rogue, thief, warrior, cleric, or wizard. On their turn, each player can explore further into the dungeon (turn over new tiles), move through the already explored parts of the dungeon, and fight monsters. When a new dungeon tile is revealed, there is typically an encounter of some sort, and new monsters to fight are added. Slain monsters reward the players with treasure, and experience points, allowing them to level up and increase their skills during play. Players must cooperate to stay alive, slay the monsters, and achieve the goal of their quest. Each scenario has a different goal - from retrieving a relic, to slaying a vampire lord._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

NO MINIATURES INCLUDED This is all of the game components (tiles, boards, rulebooks, etc) except for the minis. It is all new and unused/unpunched. Shipping in the US: Without the main box $6; with the main box $14 (the box weighs over 2 pounds by itself and requires a very big shipping carton also that adds more weight). International shipping: Please contact me.

Wizards of the Coast - D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D Wrath of Ashardalon Boardgame Language: English Players: 1 to 5 Age: 12+ Duration: about 60 min Weight: 3.210 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: A heavy shadow falls across the land, cast by a dark spire that belches smoke and oozes fiery lava. A cave mouth leads to a maze of tunnels and chambers, and deep within this monster-infested labyrinth lurks the most terrifying creature of all: a red dragon! Designed for 1-5 players, this boardgame features multiple scenarios, challenging quests, and cooperative game play. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Played 9 times. Cards kept in tuck boxes. I struggle to get this to the table enough and I want to get some more games. I cannot buy more till this moves. Help me. I will package the game for free. Shipping is on you. Looking at Australian Post it seems approx $15 - $20.
Able to provide photos if needed.

All the miniatures fully painted by hand. Please check out photos here: http://boardgamegeek.com/image/1112995/dungeons-dragons-wrath-of-ashardalon-board-game Price is negotiable. Happy to consider any reasonable offers. Also willing to consider trade offers. Game is complete and in great condition. Played a few times, but all components are still like new (well, except for the fact that I have painted the miniatures). This copy came with an extra Duergar Cleric, which I have painted as well and will include. Shipping will be exact postage only. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t charge for packing material or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;handling._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Insurance is optional though I strongly recommend it. Happy to answer any questions you might have.

FULLY PAINTED _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; INCLUDES KOBOLD CHAMPION PROMO CARD! This is a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;buy-before-I=change-my-mind_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; listing of the Ashardalon set I have hand-painted. I would not describe myself as a pro painter, but I think that the standard is good at the very least - there are a number of pictures of the pieces I have painted in the game gallery for you to judge for yourself. The game in full has only been played twice, but I have used the treasure cards and some characters a few times to play Ravenloft. The promo card is completely unused. UK postage would be £7.99. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll happily ship worldwide but secure postage is likely to be significantly more expensive owing to item weight.

This copy is actually is very good condition, only placed once or twice. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve listed it as good, as I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not sure if there was a cardboard insert originally in the box, but if there was I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have it. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve bagged and organized all the components, and there is a plano box to organize the smaller bits. The games comes from a smoke and pet free home.

Never played, just carefully punched and organized. A nice sized baggie is provided for each character, plus a baggie for each set of cards. If there was an insert I have tossed it. If you check the picture (or ask me for a more detailed one), you will see two nice Plano cases that together make the game great for play and cleanup. You can have them both for $8 extra, or I can just transfer the contents to baggies. I will ask when I send you the invoice. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is actual shipping cost for approx. 120oz to your zip code from 30082 plus $3 for box and packaging (I will finalize after you order). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$6.00 (for the box and hassle, sorry, it is much more effort on my end). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.
Punched then played once. Box and all components are in excellent condition. Shipping is $18.00 USD (large, heavy box) for U.S addresses.

Brand new, never opened, never played. Cellophane has a tear in it but otherwise is still sealed and in brand new, mint condition. No dents or scratches or anything. Size: Medium Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.
